result.title: 笔记
result.content:
golang：有换行时，用fmt.Scan(&a, &b, &c) python3: 从一行输入多个数字 n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

------------------------------------------ strstr() py s.find('aaa') >= 0

go strings.Contains(str, "aaa")

------------------------------------------ tolower() py s = s.lower()

go strings.ToLower(s)

------------------------------------------ std::string s[s.length() — 1] = '\0'; (x) s.erase(s.length() — 1);

py s = s[:-1]
